relation: User name of the table owner.
Name of a workspace that was set as a result of a call to the SetCompressWorkspace procedure.
Savepoint on the first version of the compression range. If the firstSP parameter was null in the call to the SetCompressWorkspace procedure, this column contains BEGINNING.
Savepoint on the last version of the compression range. If both the firstSP and secondSP parameters were null in the call to the SetCompressWorkspace procedure, this column contains LATEST.
textBeforeTable: WM_COMPRESS_BATCH_SIZES contains information related to compression capabilities for version-enabled tables. This view is only available to users with the WM_ADMIN_ROLE role. 5.36 WM_COMPRESS_BATCH_SIZES USER_WORKSPACES contains information about workspaces created by the current user. Its columns are the same as those in ALL_WORKSPACES in Section 5.16. 5.35 USER_WORKSPACES USER_WORKSPACE_SAVEPOINTS contains information about savepoints in workspaces created by the current user. Its columns are the same as those in ALL_WORKSPACE_SAVEPOINTS in Section 5.15. 5.34 USER_WORKSPACE_SAVEPOINTS USER_WORKSPACE_PRIVS contains information about Workspace Manager privileges in workspaces created by the current user. Its columns are the same as those in ALL_WORKSPACE_PRIVS in Section 5.14. 5.33 USER_WORKSPACE_PRIVS USER_WM_VT_ERRORS contains information about the error that occurred during the last call to the DisableVersioning or CommitDDL procedure that specified a table of which the current user is the owner and on which the current user has one or more of the following privileges: SELECT, INSERT, DELETE, UPDATE. Its columns are the same as those in ALL_WM_VT_ERRORS in Section 5.13.
textAfterTable: 5.37 WM_COMPRESSIBLE_TABLES WM_COMPRESSIBLE_TABLES contains information about version-enabled tables that need to be compressed (if compression is to be performed) between two savepoints in a workspace. To create rows in this view, use the SetCompressWorkspace procedure. Column Datatype Null? Description OWNER VARCHAR2(30) NOT NULL User name of the table owner. TABLE_NAME VARCHAR2(30) NOT NULL Name of the version-enabled table. WORKSPACE VARCHAR2(256) Name of a workspace that was set as a result of a call to the SetCompressWorkspace procedure. BEGIN_SAVEPOINT VARCHAR2(256) Savepoint on the first version of the compression range. If the firstSP parameter was null in the call to the SetCompressWorkspace procedure, this column contains BEGINNING. END_SAVEPOINT
